body:
It's been 4 years since I found this server.

I'll start with the basic information.

My name is Ben, and I'm from Australia. I like play Minecraft (although losing interest), and also FIFA 17 (it's out tomorrow :D). I got my name Chandrah from the word Chandra, which is the name of a space satellite that recorded the lowest sound on earth (at 53 octaves below middle C on a piano). It's so low that the naked ear can't hear it.

...and some generic answers:

Favourite Food & Drink: Don't have a favourite for either
Favourite Colour: White
Favourite Song: None
Trump or Clinton?: I'm not fucking American, what do I care?

title: AMA - 4 years (xBen_)

replies.body:
Wow! That is a long dedication..... :O Your name is pretty cool, you must be interested in astronomy. 

Opinions on me?
Opinions on South Korea and Greece?
Opinions on the Atlas Update?
Favorite type of meat? 
Favorite staff member?
Favorite admin?
Favorite moments on Avicus?
Favorite moments on Minecraft?
Favorite platform on Avicus?
Pepsi Cola or Coca Cola? 

Ok, that is enough *pant* *pant*. I typed all of this non-stop so I think I need a break *cough* *pant*. I hope we get to know each other ;)

replies.body:
Opinions on you? You said hi in game and everyones like "Ateh!". You're pretty popular. I look forward to knowing you better

Opinions on South Korea and Greece? Both are awesome places that have in return awesome people

Opinions on Atlas? As if the player count couldn't get any lower.... (adverts might change this)

Favourite type of Meat? Least is chops (too chewy) and favourite is probably salami or silverside

Favourite staff member? The ones I get to know most (If that's you then well done)

Favourite Admin? The only one I really know at the moment is Sessp/Posighdun so I guess it's him

Favourite moments on Avicus? Spending time with friends and getting the monuments to end long games (15+ minutes)

Favourite moments on MC? Above ^

Favourite Platform? Nebula by a country mile

Pepsi Cola or Coca Cola? What's Pepsi Cola? (I think I'd pick Coke anyways)
